creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
inscription:
Date, Stamp

in graphite on verso: R.49 | B50[undecipherable character] | P.54I | 9 (circled)
markings: stamp on verso, lower center: Veste Coburg duplicate, Lugt 451a; black collector's stamp on verso, LL: K.K, not in Lugt
provenance: Veste Coburg duplicate, Lugt 451a (until 1929; sale C. G. Boerner, Leipzig, May 1929). Unknown collector with monogram K.K. (not in Lugt). John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Drummer, Standard-Bearer, and Piper
